name: GCControllerElement
desc: An input for a physical control, such as a button or thumbstick.

items.name: var isAnalog: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the element provides analog data.

items.name: var localizedName: String?
items.desc: The localized name for the element or the remapped element.

items.name: var unmappedLocalizedName: String?
items.desc: The element’s localized name, not the remapped name.

items.name: var sfSymbolsName: String?
items.desc: A system symbol for the element or the remapped element.

items.name: var unmappedSfSymbolsName: String?
items.desc: The element’s system symbol, not the remapped symbol.

items.name: var aliases: Set<String>
items.desc: The element’s aliases you use when accessing it with the subscript notation.

items.name: var collection: GCControllerElement?
items.desc: The enclosing element for this element.

items.name: var isBoundToSystemGesture: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user binds the element to a system gesture.

items.name: var preferredSystemGestureState: GCControllerElement.SystemGestureState
items.desc: The preferred state for handling input when the user binds the element to a system gesture.

items.name: enum GCControllerElement.SystemGestureState
items.desc: A state for handling input when an element is part of a system gesture.
